CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Bike' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PCA' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External_Service' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Free_Service_Order' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Quick_Service_Order' , DATETIMEVALUE( Invoice_Date__c ) , IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Free_Coupon' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Warranty' , DATETIMEVALUE( Complete_Date__c ),NULL ))
CustomField.label: Revenue Date/Time
